welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sint-Pieters-Leeuw, Belgium! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Brussels Airport, serving flights to and from international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for domestic flights within Belgium and nearby European countries.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or login.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
